dataTemplate.name: XX_CRM_CONC_JOBS
dataTemplate.description: OD: CRM Concurrent Programs failing the Minimum Specified Threshold

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT cjd.request_id request_id, cjd.job_name job_name, cjd.module_sub_appl module_sub_appl, cjd.argument_text argument_text, to_char(cjd.date_started,'DD-MON-RRRR') date_started, TRUNC(cjd.DURATION,2) DURATION, cjd.request_status request_status, cjd.request_phase request_phase, cjd.description description FROM xx_crm_conc_jobs_details cjd WHERE cjd.overdue_flag = 'U'

SELECT cjd.request_id request_id, cjd.job_name job_name, cjd.module_sub_appl module_sub_appl, cjd.argument_text argument_text, to_char(cjd.date_started,'DD-MON-RRRR') date_started, TRUNC(cjd.DURATION,2) DURATION, cjd.request_status request_status, cjd.request_phase request_phase, cjd.description description FROM xx_crm_conc_jobs_details cjd WHERE cjd.overdue_flag = 'N'

SELECT cjd.request_id request_id, cjd.job_name job_name, cjd.module_sub_appl module_sub_appl, cjd.argument_text argument_text, to_char(cjd.date_started,'DD-MON-RRRR') date_started, TRUNC(cjd.DURATION,2) DURATION, cjd.request_status request_status, cjd.request_phase request_phase, cjd.description description FROM xx_crm_conc_jobs_details cjd WHERE cjd.overdue_flag = 'Y'
